jobInfo.postDescription:
JOB SUMMARY:  
The Medtronic Connect DMS is Medtronic’s next generation Digital Commerce platform for Dealers, that offers Online Ordering and related services such as Inventory Management and Sales Out to Hospitals.  This platform can be personalized to meet the individual customers’ needs and is a critical capability that we seek to differentiate us from our competitors. 

We are looking for an intern who could works as Tester to test the system. Has the testing methodology knowledge, can write manual test script, automated test script, perform API testing etc.

MAIN JOB DUTIES/RESPONSIBILITIES:  
•	Write test scripts and test cases from Functional Specifications or Business Requirements
•	Functional Testing
•	Automation Testing 
•	API Testing
•	Collect and tracking test results from users and input into ALM
•	Assist Change Initiator with user acceptance testing if required 


	BASIC QUALIFICATIONS
	EDUCATION REQUIRED 
•	Junior or senior students in University or College
•	Major in Computer Science, Management of Information System is preferred  


DESIRED/PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS 
•	Communication and interpersonal skills
•	Team work skills
•	Basic knowledge of software testing

公司地址：上海市东育路255号前滩世茂中心一期6F
简历投递至： ***********************
投递格式：姓名+IT+学校
jobInfo.address: 上海浦东新区美敦力(上海)管理有限公司B栋

brandComInfo.introduce:
美敦力公司于1949年，由Earl E.Bakken及Palmer J.Hermundslie建立。

美敦力于1957年制造出台便携式体外心脏起搏器，并于1960年制造出台可靠的可植入式心脏起搏系统。由此奠定了美敦力全球起搏技术领导者的地位。 美敦力公司股票于纽约证交所之市，其代号为MDT。

美国美敦力公司（Medtronic, Inc.）总部位于美国明尼苏达州明尼阿波利斯市，是全球领先的医疗科技公司，致力于为慢性疾病患者提供终身的治疗方案。其主要产品覆盖心律失常、心衰、血管疾病、心脏瓣膜置换、体外心脏支持、微创心脏手术、恶性及非恶性疼痛、运动失调、糖尿病、胃肠疾病、泌尿系统疾病、脊椎疾病、神经系统疾病及五官科手术治疗等领域。每5秒钟，世界上就有一名病人因为美敦力的产品而减轻病痛，恢复健康，延长寿命。
